content: At our organization, we utilize our extensive knowledge and experience with the Health and Social Care Act 2014 and related guidance to offer factual accuracy support to providers. Our team, consisting of specialist nurses and social workers, has expertise in report writing and evidence collection, allowing us to identify areas where CQC draft reports can be challenged and provide evidence-based responses. Our services are informed by sector-specific NICE guidance to ensure the highest level of quality and accuracy.
